feed.title: Google Cloud: Model Armor
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Model Armor

entry.content: You can use Terraform to manage Model Armor floor settings and templates. This helps reduce manual overhead with Model Armor deployments. For more information, see Terraform resources for Security Command Center.
entry.summary: Manage Model Armor settings with Terraform.
entry.title: Feature: Terraform for Model Armor
